result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for parsing and type-checking Go source code strings and printing information about the resulting packages.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating functionality related to parsing and type-checking in a single file.

gotypes/pkginfo/main.go.purpose: This file parses and type-checks a Go source code string and prints information about the resulting package.
side_effects: Logs fatal errors if parsing or type-checking fails.
risks: Potential for code injection if the input string is not controlled.
